front.court:
HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE FOR RAJASTHAN
BENCH AT JAIPUR
front.extra:
S/o Shri Niranjan Lal, Aged About 69 Years, Presently
Working As Booking Clerk, Rajasthan Road Transport Corporation
Bharatpur Depot, Resident Of Dheema Mohalla, Veer Narayan
Darwaja, Bharatpur Rajasthan. At Present residing at B-21-A,
Shiv Path Gas Godown Gali Sanjay Colony (Neharu Nagar) R.P.A.
Road, Jaipur Rajasthan
----Petitioner
Versus
1.

, Managing Director, Rajasthan State
Road Transport Corporation, Head Office, Parivahan Marg,
Chomu House, C-Scheme, Jaipur Rajasthan
2.

, Chief Manager, Rajasthan State Road
Transport Corporation Bharatpur Depot Bharatpur
(Rajasthan)
----Respondents
For Petitioner(s) :

This contempt petition has been filed by the petitioner
under Section 12 of the Contempt of Courts Act, 1971 alleging
willful disobedience of the order dated 2.4.2019 passed by a
Coordinate Bench of this Court in S.B. Civil Writ Petition No.
8706/2006 titled Jhunni Lal Versus Rajasthan State Road
Transport Corporation & Anr.
